originalTitle: learn a basic indian clubs flow
originalDescription: Indian clubs | Full body warm up. Heroic Sport - Indian clubs workouts•10K views · 9:24. Go to channel · The Most Powerful Over 50 Exercise You're Probably Not ...
transcriptText:
Give me 6 minutes of your time for today’s practice, and you’ll know a fun little pattern you can practice that helps your shoulders, wrists and posture, all while being delicious brain food!

This lil flow has Hearts, Moons, and adds moulinets into the mix.

I'm using 1lbs poly clubs in this practice video.

Other videos in this series

have a look at my other videos about light clubs

Know this movement by another name? I'm using language and terms taught to me by my coach/es.

The technique still applies whatever you call each move. I'm just happy to get people moving more with clubs/mace/their bodies. You can dive as deep as you like. I am here to help beginners and those who just want to do the thing and get moving. I love it.

hello welcome to your practice for today today we are looking at the heart and moon flow I was taught this by my coach and now I'm passing it on to you okay so we're going to start with moons let's go outward moons Let's do let's do four four outward moons remembering to cross the lead hand each time after this Moon we're going to do a heart heart good let's do four hearts three and four okay this is the top of the next moon I want you to do a molinet here molinet and finish the turn molinet at the top as you drop finish the turn molet as you drop finish the turn one more good now heart mulling out at the top heart mulling out at the top heart mullet at the top heart mullet at the top bring them behind you like we're going to do a cast that's it we're going to use a cast to change directions today come back out of it doing an inside Moon 4 3 2 one inwards Hearts 4 3 2 one now we're going to turn it into a moon but I want you to do your mullette low now Moon one 2 3 four then Hearts hot mullet backpack hot mullet good there we go okay so that is the basis of the flow what we need to do now is do less reps of it okay so let's do three of each three moons three hearts heart one 2 3 three moons with the mullet one two three turn into a heart one 2 3 good cast behind you one we'll do three as well two three we're going inwards now one two three moons alone then Hearts alone three 2 one now now it's the moon with the mullet one 2 3 now make it into a heart slice one 2 3 cast again three casts we're going to come back for outwards and we've got two reps of each now starting with the plain moons we're going to keep it to two reps of each that way you've got a little um space if you miss the transition the first round we're going to do moons Hearts moons with mulets hearts with mullets outwards and then inwards one more time last time you can always play this again all right moons one Moon Two Moons Hearts one heart two hearts moon with a mullet mullet Moon Moon with a mullet mullette Moon heart minget heart minget cast two one two inward Moon one two inward heart one two moon with a mullette it's going to start low moon with a mullette yes one two heart with a M in it start it first yes start it first yes cast back to the top Moon two heart two moon with the mullet yes one two heart with a mullette nearly forgot heart with a mullette cast for two coming back inwards inwards Moon two one two heart one two inwards moon with the mullets get it down low hot with M net good two casts okay there are the basic bones of the Han and moon flow using molinet as well have a little play with that and let me know how you go have a great day
